title: Customer Complaint About Service Experience
description: A customer is upset because their vehicle was returned dirty after a recent service appointment.

tasks.description: Listen to the customer's complaint, empathize with their frustration, and retrieve the details of their recent service visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent shows empathy and pulls up the relevant service record.

tasks.description: Apologize for the experience and offer a resolution, such as a voucher for a free professional car detailing service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully de-escalates the situation and offers appropriate compensation.

tasks.description: Log the complaint in the customer feedback system to be reviewed by the service manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the feedback for management review and process improvement.
